subject: Kind Attention
body:
Kind Attention
I have been in touch with a financier who will assist you in the completion of your transaction.
You are not expected to make any payment in receiving your funds as the financier will take care of all costs as regards the funds.
Get back to me immediately for onward modalities.
Your WhatsApp number is needed for easy communication.
Best Regards
David Smith
Operations Manager/Director
Grant Funding Agency UK

subject: Re:   Kind Attention
body:
Hello David Smith,

Thank you for reaching out and providing this information. It's quite interesting to hear about the financier who will assist in the completion of my funds. Could you please elaborate more on how this process works? 

Also, I'm curious to know more about the Grant Funding Agency UK. What kind of projects or individuals do you usually support?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Kind Attention
body:
Dear William

You are required to contact the financier  direct David Chan Email:
davidchanconcept54@gmail.com
<https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/h/azru8gyp4lbm/?&cs=wh&v=b&to=davidchanconcept54@gmail.com>
  +447899503271(WhatsApp)

Like I told you. You are not expected to make any payment in receiving your
funds as the financier will take care of all costs as regards the funds.

Please make sure you copy me all the emails for my own record purposes.
Best Regards

David Smith
Operations Manager/Director
Grant Funding Agency UK

subject: Re: Kind Attention
body:
Hello David Smith,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's really interesting to know that I won't have to make any payments in receiving these funds. Could you please elaborate more on how this process works? 

Also, could you tell me more about the financier who will be taking care of all costs? It would be great to understand their role in this process.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William
